property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. If you have Big Jake in play, reduce Scooter's Ghost Rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand. Noon: Boot Big Jake at a non-Strike Deed. Take Ghost Rock from the Deed's owner equal to either the Deed's Production or Jake's Influence, whichever is lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play when a Joker is revealed in a Draw or pull. Cancel and Ace the Joker, and replace it with the top card of its player's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ace Jim MacNeil. Discard the Sweetrock Dude(s) with the highest Bullet rating in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude. Until the end of the game, the Dude cannot move to any non-adjacent location without a card effect. Immediately before any Gambling Phase during which the Dude is at home, the Dude can boot as a Reaction to remove this effect. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Take Ghost Rock from the player equal to half of the pull rounded up, up to the player's entire Vault. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Every Harrowed Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, call-outs by Harrowed Dudes are unrefusable. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Every Harrowed Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty and -1 Influence (minimums 0) until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, Harrowed Dudes cannot refuse call-outs and do not make the Harrowed pull when Aced. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Dude's Bullet rating cannot be changed to a Draw and cannot be reduced by an opponent's Shootout action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination: While Armitage is in a shootout, every opposing non-Terror has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: All Gadgets are turned face-down until after Nightfall. While face-down, those Gadgets are considered out of play except for uniqueness purposes. Every Dude with one or more of these Gadgets has a -1 Influence penalty until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when another player moves a Dude to your home or to a Deed you own. A Terror in your Play hand immediately enters play without cost or restriction and calls out the Dude to an unrefusable shootout. If the Terror is in play when the shootout ends, discard the Terror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target one of your Dudes in this shootout with more than 0 Influence. The Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and has -1 Influence until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ace John Bloody Knife: Discard the Sioux Dude(s) with the highest value in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:1. Experienced. Reaction: Boot Austin when a Spell pull is revealed. The Spell automatically fails.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dudes at this location can join shootouts at adjacent locations without moving or booting, even if booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this Dude has an Upkeep cost over 0, lower the Upkeep cost by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Return the player's entire Vault to the Bank. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Basement cannot be attached to a Strike. Terrors gain +1 Influence while at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bedrock can only be attached to a Strike, but you can attach it to a Strike you do not own or control. Bedrock lowers the Strike's Production to +1, and the Production cannot be increased.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Whenever a Terror is Aced while opposing Benjamin in a shootout, Benjamin's controller may either gain 1 Ghost Rock or lower the Fear level by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. If you have Scooter in play, reduce Jake's Ghost Rock cost and Upkeep cost by 1 when bringing him into play from your Play hand. Noon: Boot Scooter at a Strike. Take Ghost Rock from the Strike's owner equal to either the Strike's Production or Scooter's Bullet rating, whichever is lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Reaction Hex 6: Immediately before a Dude makes a skill pull, cast this Hex. If this Hex succeeds, the skill fails unless the Dude makes two consecutive, successful pulls.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Dude's Influence cannot be reduced in any way.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is a Stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job Pull: Target Boom-Boom's Deed. If the job succeeds, Ace the Deed. If the pull exceeds Boom-Boom's value, ace him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude. The next time a player other than the Dude's controller Aces the Dude with an action or during a shootout, the player gains Ghost Rock equal to the Ghost Rock paid to play this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes with more than 1 Influence. Get any card from your deck or discard pile and add it to your hand. Discard a card from you hand. Shuffle the deck if the card you got came from it. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Unique. You must control a Mad Scientist to bring Bulletproof Glass into play. Your Dudes at this location cannot be called out without a card effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harrowed. Mystical Goods being attached to Cassandra have their Ghost Rock cost reduced by 2. Reaction: Immediately before bringing a Terror into play, boot Cassandra. Reduce the Terror's Ghost Rock cost by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Shootout: Ace a Goods in the opposing posse.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Harrowed. Chester can be targeted by two copies of each Harrowed Ability card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You can bring non-Gadget cards with the Horse trait into play for 2 less Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a number of Dudes at one Deed equal to the number of your ready Gadget Weapons at the Deed. Send the Dudes home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Complaint Window can only be attached to a Government Deed. The Complaint Window lowers the Deed's Upkeep cost to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Shootout Miracle X: Target an opposing Dude. X is the Dude's value plus Bullet rating. If this Miracle succeeds, the Dude joins your posse and you gain control of the Dude until the shootout ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Conveyor Belt can only be attached to a Strike. The Strike gains +1 Production.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Shootout Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, this Shaman moves to the shootout's location, ignoring movement restrictions, and joins your posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. The Dance Hall gains +1 Production for each card in play with the Brothel trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Dudes at Boot Hill go to their controllers' homes and become Abominations until after Nightfall. The Dudes have an Upkeep cost of 0 this turn. Immediately before Nightfall, all of these Dudes in play return to Boot Hill; this is not considered Acing them. Ace this card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Card effects cannot save Dudes being Aced in a shootout while Templeton is in the opposing posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Unique Abomination. Devil Bats cannot attach Goods. If at least twice as many Dudes are in the Devil Bats' posse than in the opposing posse, your hand is considered two ranks higher and the worst hand of that rank.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: While Dexter is in a shootout, other Dudes cannot take Shootout actions printed on their cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:2. While Doctor Duvalier is at a Strike, the Strike gains +1 Production.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when a Harrowed Ability card targets a Harrowed Dude. The Harrowed Dude loses control to his or her manitou; discard the Harrowed Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, look at any Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Elizabeth is in Town Square, each of your Dudes has the ability 'Noon: Send this Dude home booted.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:1. Shootout: Once per card attached to Elmo, any Dude in Elmo's posse can attach (and make ready if it's a Weapon) a card attached to Elmo.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Noon: Ace one of your non-Harrowed Dudes, Enoch gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence until after Nightfall. Enoch can take this action twice per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:1. Experienced. Noon: Select a Dude at Envy's location with more Goods attached than Envy. Target a Goods on the Dude that Envy can legally attach. Attach the Goods to Envy, regardless of who controls the location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: If this is the last card in your hand, Draw cards equal to your maximum hand size. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced Harrowed Harlot. Noon: Target a Dude. The Dude's controller pulls twice: if both pulls exceed the Dude's value, Ace the Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist:1. Experienced. Noon: Move Fineas to a different location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 6: Target an unbooted Wanted Dude at this or an adjacent location. If this Miracle succeeds, boot the Dude. If this Miracle fails, discard it. This Blessed can perform this Miracle any number of times per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 7: Boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, then until the end of the turn, a Dude moving from a home to an adjacent location or from the Town Square to an adjacent location must boot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, choose an action printed on a Dude in play. The Dude cannot take the action until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Fool's Joker is only useful for pulls. If you pull it, you choose its suit and value. If you reveal it in a Draw hand, discard it, then replace it with the top card of your deck. You cannot have more than two Jokers in your deck. The Fool's Joker does not count against your deck limit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play this card when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Gain 4 Ghost Rock. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes with a Bullet rating over 0. The Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty and gains +1 Influence until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Gypsy's Tent increases it's controller's maximum hand size by one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes at one of your Deeds. Gain Ghost Rock equal to either the Dude's Bullet rating or the Deed's Production, whichever is lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may add a card from your lowball hand to your Play hand. If you do so, discard a card from your Play hand. Ace this card.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, Dudes at their homes have -1 Influence (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: When Hope in Winter joins a posse for a job, all other Dudes in the posse except the dealer do not boot when joining the posse or returning home from the job.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Dude with an Upkeep cost over 0. Raise the Dude's Upkeep cost by 1 until the Dude leaves play. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ace one of your Dudes. Get any card from your deck, show it to the other players, and add it to your Play hand. Discard a card from your Play hand. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target one of your Dudes with an Upkeep cost over 0. Raise the Upkeep cost by 1. Next time the Dude goes to Boot Hill, collect 3 Ghost Rock.

property.value: When Nightfall begins this turn, all Dudes at their homes permanently lose 1 Influence (minimum 0). Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster and target a Dude in Boot Hill. X is the value of the target Dude. If this Hex succeeds, return the Dude to play under your control, Harrowed. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when one of your Dudes with one or more Goods is Aced. Redistribute the Dude's Goods to any of your other Dudes that can attach them, even if the Dudes are booted or at locations you do not control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Move both posses to the Town Square, ignoring movement restrictions. Continue the shootout normally in the Town Square.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 5: If this Miracle succeeds, lower one of your Dudes' Upkeep costs to 0 until after Nightfall next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, all Dudes at this location except this Blessed go home without booting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Long Hallways can only be attached to an in-town Deed. Locations two locations away from this one on your street are adjacent to this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Experienced. Raise the Fear level by 2 while the Manor is in play. Players other than the Manor's owner cannot gain control of the Manor or of Deeds adjacent to it. While the Fear level is 10, you have 2 additional Control Points.

property.value: Mad Scientist:1. Weapon Gadgets being created by Lukas cost 1 less Ghost Rock and have -1 Difficulty until Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Improvements cost 1 less Ghost Rock for the Lumberyard's controller. Controller Noon: Boot the Lumberyard. Ace a card in play with 'The Tree' in the title.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. Shootout: Boot Malrog and lower his Bullet rating to 0 until the end of the shootout. Target an opposing Dude with a lower value. The Dude cannot be the opposing posse's shooter or take actions. If the Dude is ever the only one remaining in his or her posse, Ace the Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Max increases the value of every other Sweetrock Dude at his location by 4 (maximum K).

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Government. Spells cannot target Dudes at the Mental Hospital.

property.value: Blessed:1. Experienced. While in a shootout, Meredith decreases the value of all Terrors in the opposing posse by 5 (minimum 1).

property.value: Reaction: Play immediately before the Gambling Phase Draw. Play lowball inversely (high hand wins) this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex 6: Target a Dude at this or an adjacent location. If this Hex succeeds, this Huckster copies the Influence or Bullet rating of the Dude, until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Pull: Play when the Fear level is greater than 6. Target one of your Dudes in Boot Hill. If the pull is less than the Dudes value, return the Dude to your Play hand. The next time a copy of the Dude enters play, the Dude permanently gains the Harrowed trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout. If this shootout is not for a job, send home booted all Dudes in this shootout except the dealer and the target. Other Dudes cannot join either posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mystical. Mystical Goods being attached to this Dude from your Play hand cost 3 less Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout. Choose one of your Dudes in this shootout. Target an opposing Dude. After the shootout, whenever these two Dudes oppose each other in a shootout, your Dude gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: X is the Fear level. If this Hex succeeds, raise the Fear level by 1 until the end of the turn and discard this Hex.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.value: Private. Controller Reaction: When a pull is revealed, boot the Observatory. The pull is discarded and the player making the pull replaces it with the top card of his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Abomination. Mystical. Horse. Noon: Move this Dude to another location. Shootout: Move this Dude into the current shootout, ignoring movement restrictions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when another player is about to take 1 or more Ghost Rock from your Vault. The player cannot take the Ghost Rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty: 4. Reaction: Immediately before the start of High Noon, boot the Pocket Watch. Take a Noon action before the first Noon action of the Winner.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:1. Abomination. All Studs become Draws during a shootout with the Poison Woman.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Saloon. Every non-Wanted Dude at the Polecat Saloon has -2 Influence (minimum 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card after a pull succeeds for a skill Difficulty over 6. The skilled Dude permanently gains +1 Influence. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, Dudes in town cannot move to out-of-town locations, and vice versa. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card after you take an action printed on a Goods. You can use the action a second time this turn.

property.value: Mad Scientist. Gadget Difficulty 7. Reaction: Immediately after a Dude moves, boot the RADAR. Move this Dude to the same location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card immediately before bringing an in-town Deed into play. Target one of your in-town Deeds. Discard the targeted Deed. Bring the new Deed into play at the old Deed's location. The new Deed's Ghost Rock cost is reduced by the old Deed's printed Ghost Rock cost. Dudes who were at the old Deed remain at the new Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike.

property.value: The Rope Bridge can only be attached to a Strike. Opponents' card effects cannot send home or remove from the shootout Dudes in a shootout at this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Saloon. Determine control of the Rough and Tumble Saloon by Bullet rating instead of Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Runnin' Water's Deed has the ability 'Controller Noon: Boot this Deed. Unboot a Dude at this location.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Immediately after Gambling Phase Draw hands are revealed, boot Sammy. Target any non-Event card revealed by another player. Discard the card and replace it with the top card of the player's deck. The player's new hand is not considered cheating, regardless of its contents.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: Boot Sandra. Look at the top two cards of any deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:1. Experienced. All Terrors at Saul's location have a +1 Influence bonus for the purpose of controlling the location, as well as a +1 Bullet bonus.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.value: The Second Story can only be attached to an in-town Deed worth at least 1 Control Point. The Deed gains a +1 Control Point bonus.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.value: Private. Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Choose one of your Dudes at this location and a Weapon attached to the Dude. Until the end of the game, while the Dude has the Weapon ready, he or she gains a +1 Bullet bonus. You can only take this action once per Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. The Sin Eater cannot attach Goods. Reaction: When a Dude Aced at the Sin Eater's location goes to Boot Hill, the Sin Eater gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 8: Boot this Blessed. If this Miracle succeeds, then until the end of the turn, a Dude moving from a home to an adjacent location of from Town Square to an adjacent location must boot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. Target a Dude at this Huckster's location. X is the Dude's value. If this Hex succeeds, turn the Dude face-down; the Dude is out of play (except for uniqueness) until after Nightfall this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Noon: Choose an action printed on a Dude in Boot Hill. This Dude is considered to have that action printed on his or her card until after Nightfall.' Ace this card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Move any Maze Rat into your posse. Samantha can take this action in the shootout, at the shootout's location, or at a location adjacent to the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Every Dude who enters play this turn has -1 Influence (minimum 0) until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. You may boot any number of your Mad Scientist Dudes when you bring the Strike Experiment #2 into play. The Strike Experiment's Production equals the number of Dudes you booted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Sun Shu-Jen will not attach weapons. Shootout: Shu-Jen gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the end of the shootout for each Huckster in the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Gadget Dude Difficulty: 8. SUZY cannot begin the game in play. To bring SUZY into play, pull as if SUZY were a Gadget being created by one of your Mad Scientists. SUZY enters play at the Mad Scientist's location. When one of your Mad Scientists creates a Gadget, you may attach the Gadget to SUZY instead of to the Mad Scientist.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Shootout Hex X: If the opposing posse has more than one Dude, boot this Huckster. Target a Dude in the posse. X is the Dude's value plus Bullet rating plus Influence. If this Hex succeeds, the Dude comes under your control and begins a shootout against the rest of his or her posse. The new shootout ends after one round; control of the Dude returns to the other player, and the original shootout resumes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card immediately before a skill pull is made when you have another, unbooted Dude at the same location and with the same skill as the skilled Dude. Add the second Dude's skill rating to the acting Dude's for the pull.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty 5. Shootout: Once per shootout round, give the Ammo-matic a +1 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Coalition is both Agency and Texas Rangers. Increase your maximum hand size by one. While you have Agency and Texas Rangers Dudes in the same posse, each of your Dudes in the posse has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0). While you have Agency and Texas Rangers Dudes in play, The Coalition gains +1 Production.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Discard The Evidence. Target a Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes un-Wanted. Noon: Ace The Evidence and pay 2 Ghost Rock. Target an un-Wanted Dude in play. The Dude becomes Wanted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Ace one of your Wanted Dudes. Get any card from your deck or discard pile and add it to your hand. Shuffle the deck if the card came from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Starting with you and going clockwise, players may boot as many of their Hucksters as they wish. If the combined skill rating of all of the Hucksters exceeds 8, each player that booted at least one Huckster gains 2 Victory Points. This Event does not resolve if another copy of it has already resolved this game. Ace this card and the booting Huckster(s) with the lowest value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. The Slaughterhouse gains +1 Production while The Horse Doctor is in play. Controller Reaction: Boot The Horse Doctor when a non-Gadget card with the Horse trait is Aced. Put the Horse into its owner's hand instead of into Boot Hill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. All Stud Dudes are Draws while at The Jinx's location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Dude in play with the highest value permanently becomes an Abomination. For each of the Dudes who was not already a Terror, the Dude's controller gains 1 Victory Point. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:0. Noon: Boot The Taskmaster. Target a Dude at The Taskmaster's location. Permanently lower The Taskmaster's and the Dude's values by 2. If either Dude's value falls under 1, Ace that Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Timmy has no Ghost Rock cost if you control The Orphanage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When bringing a Deed into play, boot this Dude. Gain 2 Ghost Rock, which you may use to pay for the Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Your opponent must Draw and show you his or her hand before you draw. Your first revealed Draw hand is automatically considered illegal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card immediately before a skill pull is made. Increase the skill's Difficulty by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Government. Controller Noon: For each Dude at the Enlistment Office, pull: If the pull is a club, discard the Dude (the Dude is sent off to war). If the pull is an Ace of clubs, ace the Dude instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a location you control that contains one or more Abominations. Each non-Terror Dude at the location pulls: if the pull value exceeds the Dude's value minus the number of Abominations at the location, discard the Dude. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Abomination. For each Dude Aced at the Dance Hall Girl's location, the Dance Hall Girl gains either a +1 Bullet bonus or +1 Influence, your choice, until after Nightfall. Noon: Target a Dude at the Dance Hall Girl's location with a value lower than the Dance Hall Girl's Bullet rating plus Influence. Send the Dude home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot your Outfit card. Target a Deed. Every Maze Rat at the Deed gains a +1 Bullet bonus and +1 Influence for each other Maze Rat at the Deed. Such a bonus goes away if its Dude leaves the Deed, and all such bonuses go away after Nightfall. The Influence increase does not count toward your total Influence during Nightfall. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Noon: Move Victor to a location with no Dudes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon. Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Reaction: When another Dude at this Dude's location with over 0 Influence is Aced, this Dude gains +1 Influence until the end of the turn. This Dude can take this action once for each aced Dude.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot one of your Dudes to call out another Dude at the same location to an unrefusable shootout. During the shootout, all Dudes have their Bullet ratings replaced by their Influence, and all bonuses and penalties to Bullet ratings apply to Influence. Dudes Aced in this shootout leave the shootout but remain at the shootout's location. The winning posse controls this location until after Nightfall, regardless of Influence totals.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Noon Spirit 6: Each of your Dudes at this Shaman's location gains a +1 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall. Shootout Spirit 8: Each of your Dudes in this posse gains a +1 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dudes at this location can have more than one ready Weapon. If Dudes leave this location or the Locker leaves play, each Dude with more than one ready Weapon must choose a single ready Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 7: If this Miracle succeeds, target a Wanted Dude in play. Move this Blessed to the Dude's location. The Blessed calls out the Dude to an unrefusable shootout. If the Dude is Aced during the shootout, gain 1 Victory Point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: During Nightfall this turn, players do not count Victory Points when checking the victory condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Get any Deed or Improvement from your deck or discard pile, show it to your opponents, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck if you look through it for the Deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Mystical. The Whateley Family Bible has no Ghost Rock cost if being attached to Wilhelmina Whateley. Terrors at this Dude's location (including this Dude if he or she is a Terror) gain a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and a +1 bonus to each skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Terrors has its Upkeep cost lowered by 1 (minimum 0). You always have additional Control Points equal to the Fear level minus 6 (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster:3. Experienced. Lower each of your Terrors' Upkeep costs by 1 (minimum 0). Shootout: Ace one of your Dudes. Target an opposing Dude with a Bullet rating less than that of the Dude you aced. Ace the target Dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:3. Experienced.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Noon: Boot this Dude. Target a Dude in this or an adjacent location. The target's controller pulls three times: if all three pulls exceed the target's value, Ace the target Dude.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Play this card when a Dude being Aced is no longer aced due to a card effect. Cancel the effect and ace the Dude normally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Shootout: All opposing Dudes are considered to have blank text boxes until after the shootout ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty: 5. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude. Until the shootout ends, the target Dude cannot be the shooter if another Dude can be, and the target Dude's Bullet rating does not contribute to the number of cards Drawn or redrawn by the opposing player.
